name: I'll Do It Tomorrow
description:
It's Sara's first day of work.
However, when she takes the elevator to go to the office, she suddenly finds herself on a mysterious floor.
What truth lies behind these weird rooms?
Will you be able to move on? Or rather... will you want to move on?

Features:

  • Play as Sara, a 24-year-old girl.
  • Explore mysterious rooms.
  • Interact with people with familiar faces.
  • Collect key fragments.
  • Find a way to leave this place.
